name: windows-default-wallpapers
title: Windows Default Wallpapers
description: Easily change between the default Windows wallpapers without changing full themes

commands.name: browse-wallpapers
commands.title: Browse Wallpapers
commands.description: Browse all default wallpapers included with Windows 11
commands.subtitle: Windows Default Wallpapers

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: muhammadrizo

preferences.name: primaryAction
preferences.description: Choose the primary action for a wallpaper
preferences.title: Primary Action
